help.name: !gdb commands
help.value: Displays all commands the bot can offer.

about.name: !gdb about
about.value: Learn about the bot, its author and how to help support.

professions.name: !gdb enchant [enchant]
professions.value: Displays information about the enchant and who can craft it in the guild.

professions.name: !gdb armor [armor]
professions.value: Displays information about the armor and who can craft it in the guild.

professions.name: !gdb potion [potion]
professions.value: Displays information about the potion and who can craft it in the guild.

classes.name: !gdb [class] [bis list/rotation/consumes]
classes.value: Displays information about a given classes bis list, most common rotation or most common consumes for the class.

cloak.name: lesser agi
cloak.description: Permanently enchant a cloak to give 3 Agility.
